replies.body:
I see you as a friend, although competitiveness kind of separates us from being close. It bothers me how you have tried to get my whole team banned l0l, but recently you've been more chill and nicer to me. You're good at melee and wank at bow hahhahahhaa.

Throughout Tourney 1 you were probably the best player. When you were banned though it was controversial, and with sketchy clips of you in T1 I kinda lost some respect for you. In the second tourney the best player was probably Barney, he was really consistent and did a great job leading BC. In the league the best player was maybe Eric, I didn't care too much about other teams and Eric seemed to do a great job for Apollo. T3's best player has to be Budah or Seuth or Zeus, at least from my eyes being in Apollo, they were very consistent and carried in kills.

Right now the best 5 players are probably Budah, You, Raging, Eric and Seuth (Bias to Apollo I know)
replies.body_tagged:
I see you as a friend, although competitiveness kind of separates us from being close. It bothers me how you have tried to get my whole team banned l0l, but recently you've been more chill and nicer to me. You're good at melee and wank at bow hahhahahhaa.

Throughout Tourney 1 you were probably the best player. When you were banned though it was controversial, and with sketchy clips of you in T1 I kinda lost some respect for you. In the second tourney the best player was probably Barney, he was really consistent and did a great job leading BC. In the league the best player was maybe Eric, I didn't care too much about other teams and Eric seemed to do a great job for Apollo. T3's best player has to be Budah or Seuth or Zeus, at least from my eyes being in Apollo, they were very consistent and carried in kills.

Right now the best 5 players are probably Budah, You, Raging, Eric and Seuth (Bias to Apollo I know)

replies.body:
I didn't know you before Apollo but I had a hard time killing you in 1v1s. You were good at PvP before joining Apollo and during your time you have drastically improved. I can definitely call you one of our best at melee. We haven't spoken much personally though since you mute alot, but you are really chill.

DTM - Rendezvous 3.5
CTW - Rendezvous New CTW
TDM - Supply

replies.body:
Lego!!! Happy Birthday, Che, thanks for being a great friend and leader of Apollo.
Did you know that this day in the year of 1534 Jacques Cartier landed in Canada, and claimed it for France?
Questions...

  1. Are you wearing socks right now?
  2. What is your favourite thing to spend money on?
  3. What do you use more often, the dictionary or thesaurus?
  4. Why?
  5. Worst injury you have had?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. Which of the four seasons do you most love? Or hate?
  8. What was your first impression of me?
Hope you're having an awesome day dude, have fun! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

reply_to.body:
I see you as a friend, although competitiveness kind of separates us from being close. It bothers me how you have tried to get my whole team banned l0l, but recently you've been more chill and nicer to me. You're good at melee and wank at bow hahhahahhaa.

Throughout Tourney 1 you were probably the best player. When you were banned though it was controversial, and with sketchy clips of you in T1 I kinda lost some respect for you. In the second tourney the best player was probably Barney, he was really consistent and did a great job leading BC. In the league the best player was maybe Eric, I didn't care too much about other teams and Eric seemed to do a great job for Apollo. T3's best player has to be Budah or Seuth or Zeus, at least from my eyes being in Apollo, they were very consistent and carried in kills.

Right now the best 5 players are probably Budah, You, Raging, Eric and Seuth (Bias to Apollo I know)

Throughout Tourney 1 you were probably the best player. When you were banned though it was controversial, and with sketchy clips of you in T1 I kinda lost some respect for you.
